#summary maven plugin repository configuration
#labels maven,plugin,repository

=== Repository URLs ===

  * release : http://cobertura-it-maven-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/maven2/releases

=== POM plugin repository configuration ===

{{{
<pluginRepositories>
    <pluginRepository>
        <id>cobertura-it-maven-plugin-maven2-release</id>
        <url>http://cobertura-it-maven-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/maven2/releases</url>
        <snapshots>
            <enabled>false</enabled>
        </snapshots>
        <releases>
            <enabled>true</enabled>
        </releases>
    </pluginRepository>
</pluginRepositories>
}}}
